Hands-On Exercise 5d (Visual Multivariate Analysis with Parallel Coordinates Plot)

Author

Zanelle Lee Wenfang

Modified

February 13, 2025

Installing R packages

pacman::p_load(GGally, parallelPlot, tidyverse)
package 'parallelPlot' successfully unpacked and MD5 sums checked

The downloaded binary packages are in
    C:\Users\Zanelle\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpgXUCrj\downloaded_packages

Importing data

wh <- read_csv("Data files/WHData-2018.csv")

Plotting Static Parallel Coordinates Plot

ggparcoord(data = wh, 
           columns = c(7:12))
#with boxplot
ggparcoord(data = wh, 
           columns = c(7:12), 
           groupColumn = 2,
           scale = "uniminmax",
           alphaLines = 0.2,
           boxplot = TRUE, 
           title = "Parallel Coordinates Plot of World Happines Variables")
#with facet
ggparcoord(data = wh, 
           columns = c(7:12), 
           groupColumn = 2,
           scale = "uniminmax",
           alphaLines = 0.2,
           boxplot = TRUE, 
           title = "Multiple Parallel Coordinates Plots of World Happines Variables by Region") +
  facet_wrap(~ Region)

x-axis text label

#rotating label
ggparcoord(data = wh, 
           columns = c(7:12), 
           groupColumn = 2,
           scale = "uniminmax",
           alphaLines = 0.2,
           boxplot = TRUE, 
           title = "Multiple Parallel Coordinates Plots of World Happines Variables by Region") +
  facet_wrap(~ Region) + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30))
#adjusting rotated label
ggparcoord(data = wh, 
           columns = c(7:12), 
           groupColumn = 2,
           scale = "uniminmax",
           alphaLines = 0.2,
           boxplot = TRUE, 
           title = "Multiple Parallel Coordinates Plots of World Happines Variables by Region") +
  facet_wrap(~ Region) + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30, hjust=1))

Plotting interactive Parallel Coordinates Plot

#basic plot
wh <- wh %>%
  select("Happiness score", c(7:12))
parallelPlot(wh,
             width = 320,
             height = 250)
#rotate axis label
parallelPlot(wh,
             rotateTitle = TRUE)
#changing colour scheme
parallelPlot(wh,
             continuousCS = "YlOrRd",
             rotateTitle = TRUE)
#plot histogram along axis
histoVisibility <- rep(TRUE, ncol(wh))
parallelPlot(wh,
             rotateTitle = TRUE,
             histoVisibility = histoVisibility)
